item.title: Over-Tokenized Transformer: Vocabulary is Generally Worth Scaling
item.description: Boosting Large Language Model (LLM) performance, researchers introduce Over-Tokenized Transformers, decoupling input/output vocabularies to improve language modeling. Scaling input vocabularies improv…
